entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the subject of much renewed muttering and pointing in the corridors. He is also compared to Susan Bones by her, who says she now has a good idea what it feels like to be Harry.

entities.name: susan bones
entities.description: Susan Bones is mentioned as one of the students who are victims among the Hogwarts students. She compares herself to Harry and expresses her sympathy for him.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as the school where the students are studying. It is also mentioned that the students are victims of the ten Death Eaters.

relationships.description: Susan Bones compares herself to Harry, saying she now has a good idea what it feels like to be him.
The students of Hogwarts are victims among the ten Death Eaters.
